channel.title: Trade fix
channel.description: can some1 help when anyone trades if they dont click at the bottom the trade screen just flashes up and the other persons stays in trade if they put anything in they lose it can anyone help

item.title: Trade fix
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“sssylasss, post:2, topic:446291”]try replacing your tradeandduel class with this(save your old one incase it doesnt work)
http://pastebin.com/0ty28W07[/quote]
That wouldn’t fix it.
I think it COULD be client sided.
But alot of servers do this.
It’s not really a “glitch” or a bug.
Just leave it alone until you see a guide.

Read full topic
